content: dragon s egg hat is a fitted beanie style available in four sizes it is knitted flat from the brim up and sewn together to maintain the pattern correctly across the seam this hat is also the perfect gauge swatch for our there be dragon s jumper pattern it is big enough that you can make an accurate measurement of both stitch and row gauge over the pattern and have something more interesting than a square to show for it if making as a gauge swatch for the matching jumper we recommend making the medium or large size to give enough stitches for an accurate measurement the pattern is fully charted
